General.Name: Baoding Tianwei Baobian Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Baoding Tianwei Baobian Electric Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells power transmission and transformation equipment in China and internationally. It offers shell type, gas insulated, phase-shifting, dry type, and HVDC transformers, as well as reactors. The company sells transformers for generation, transmission, distribution, and railway industries. Baoding Tianwei Baobian Electric Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Baoding, China.
General.Address: No. 2222 West Tianwei Road, Baoding, China, 071056
